data.actual_result: Discord either refreshes abruptly or freezes
data.expected_result: FFXIV displays itself once selected to screenshare
data.short_description: Screensharing Final Fantasy XIV with sound refreshes Discord when selected or freezes it
data.steps_to_repro: - Start FFXIV - Start a call in a DM - Attempt to screenshare FFXIV with sound enabled
